attributes.action: Remove Turkey from the red list.
attributes.additional_details: There are children in Turkey stuck with their families unable to come and are going to miss their first weeks off school and most importantly their education. Please take this into account and review the current status of Turkey and remove it from the red list.
attributes.background: Remove Turkey from the red list for international travel. Turkey has been on the red list for more than three months. Millions of people from the U.K go to Turkey every year. Many families are stuck in Turkey separated from their families and children in the U.K and cannot afford quarantine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587179
